          <title>
            <string language="en">What do you know about the Theatre?</string>
            <string language="es">¿Qué sabes sobre el teatro?</string>
            <string language="ga">Céard atá ar eolas agat faoin Téatar?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kennen Sie über das Theater?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que connaissez-vous le théâtre ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que você sabe sobre o theatre?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa conoscete circa il teatro?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι ξέρετε για το θέατρο;</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A quick six question quiz about the Theatre</string>
            <string language="es">Un rápido cuestionario de seis preguntas sobre el teatro</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gceist tapa le sé cheist faoin Téatar.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">Teatro</string>

théâtre</string>

teatro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γρήγορα έξι εξετάζουν το διαγωνισμό γνώσεων για το 
θέατρο</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
